page.title: 06ST. MARY'S CHURCH
page.content: Yesterday we went to St.Marys church, we went up there at half past one.We went in a mini bus to look at the area we are working on,also we went there to see what it looked like.It is very very old but now it looks a shambles.I wish they had kept it beautiful and neat instead of destroying it and wrecking it,I am also angry about the litter there.What we had to do is write down all the names of the people buried there.We also made rubbings of the gravestones and trees.We also found out how old the people were.The oldest I saw was 77 years old and the youngest 1 year old the grave was tiny. I am very sad. We collected wild flowers. There were; cowslips, bluebells, buttercups, dandelions and most popular of all, daisies.
